Lexington-Fayette.WGPL, Lexington: WGPL is a neighborhood in southwestern Lexington, Kentucky, United States. Its name is an acronym for each street in the neighborhood - Wabash Drive, Lackawanna Drive, Goodrich Avenue, Pensacola Drive, and Norfolk Drive. It is located between Rosemont Garden, Southland Drive, Nicholasville Road, and the Norfolk Southern railroad tracks.
